body_html: @chhwang I've been doing similar debugging recently and on a simple benchmark I observing that transferring data between TF workers on same machine is about 500-1GB/second, while making data available to Python client in another process on same machine is <100MB/second
body_text: @chhwang I've been doing similar debugging recently and on a simple benchmark I observing that transferring data between TF workers on same machine is about 500-1GB/second, while making data available to Python client in another process on same machine is <100MB/second
body: @chhwang I've been doing similar debugging recently and on a [simple benchmark](https://gist.github.com/yaroslavvb/1124bb02a9fd4abce3d86caf2f950cb2) I observing that transferring data between TF workers on same machine is about 500-1GB/second, while making data available to Python client in another process on same machine is <100MB/second
